songs.title: Chillin’ With You
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Britney Spears]
You, you, you

[Verse 1: Britney Spears]
I laughed so much that I cried
I danced so much till I was tired
I drank some red wine
And now I'm walking on the sky
I had the time of my life
And you know

[Pre-Chorus: Britney Spears]
And you know
I, I'm feelin' alright
'Cause I don't got to worry about a thing
And you know...
I, I'm feelin' alright
'Cause I don't got to worry about a thing

[Chorus: Britney Spears]
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
I'm chill

[Verse 2: Jamie Lynn]
I sang so loud that I smiled
I made it worth my while
I drank some white wine
Now I'm walking on the sky
I had the time of my life

[Pre-Chorus: Britney Spears]
And you know..
I, I'm feelin' alright
Cause I don't got to worry about a thing
And you know..
I, I'm feelin' alright
Cause I don't got to worry about a thing

[Chorus: Britney Spears]
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
I'm chill

[Bridge: Britney Spears]
Every day every day every day
Chillin' with you
Every day every day every day
Chillin' with you

[Chorus: Britney Spears]
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
I'm chill

[Pre-Chorus: Britney Spears]
And you know..
I, I'm feelin' alright
'Cause I don't got to worry about a thing
And you know..
I, I'm feelin' alright
'Cause I don't got to worry about a thing

[Chorus: Britney Spears]
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
When I'm with you
I'm chillin', I'm chillin'
I'm chill
